ISSUE.TITLE: Text widget overrides global parameters box
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary The combination of global parameters and a text widget results on global parameters hidden from view. This doesn't affect functionality as the parameter is still present in the URL and queries work as expected which leads me to think that it's only an FE problem. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Create a query with a global parameter (selecting the checkbox "Global" when creating the parameter in the query). 2. Create a new dashboard and add the widget (or more widgets). The global parameter should be seen as a separate box at the top. ![screen shot 2017-02-10 at 11 50 34](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/124494/22822428/2b185a16-ef88-11e6-9b6b-04de9aa20aa4.png) 3. Add a new widget, select "Text Box", add any text and add it to the dashboard. 4. Refresh the browser window (or open it in a separate tab): the box with global parameters disappears from view. ![screen shot 2017-02-10 at 11 51 12](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/124494/22822468/51b69c78-ef88-11e6-8b15-0136fe1c90bf.png) ### Technical details: * Redash Version: 1.0.0+b2720 * Browser/OS: Tested in both Safari 10.0.3 and Chrome 56.0.2924.87 for OS X.
